channel.title: Hackathons on Enrique Saez
channel.description: Recent content in Hackathons on Enrique Saez

item.title: Hackatrips - January'18 Madrid
item.description:
Fitur is the largest trade show for the tourism industry in the world. It is held in Ifema, Madrid's trade fair, once a year.

During the last two days of the fair, minube organized Hackatrips, a hackathon encouraging innovation around the tourism industry.

item.title: AngelHack - May'17
item.description: AngelHack organized a hackathon in Barcelona last weekend. Having attended lately two other hackathons as a sponsor I thought it would be nice to get back to the hacker side and put together a project over the weekend.

item.title: LauzHack - Nov'16
item.description: Throughout the weekend of 18th - 20th November I attended Lauzhack, a student-organized and student-oriented Hackathon in Lausanne, Switzerland, as a Skyscanner representative.

item.title: HackUPC - Oct'16
item.description: HackUPC is a student-led and student-oriented hackathon for tech-enthusiast held in Barcelona, at the premises of Universitat Politecnica de Catalunya over the weekend of October 1st 2016.

item.title: THack Mallorca - May'16
item.description: During Friday night May 6 through Sunday May 8 I attended THack Mallorca, a Hackathon organized by Tnooz, a global provider of news and analysis to the travel industry.
